name: Badonk-a-Donk!
description:
P1 inputs:
A - Jump left
D - Jump right
S - Ground Pound

P2 inputs:
left - Jump left
right - Jump right
down - Ground Pound

Global inputs:
R - Restart

The goal of the game is to hit your opponent with your ground pound. Hit your opponent three times and you win.

Every time you hit your opponent you grow larger and move slower.

Hitting walls and ceiling will cause you to go dizzy so be careful!

Credits:
Programming: Isac Degerborg "Fisac"
Visual Art: Julian Kent "Manaspurt"
Sound and Music: Adam Wijk "Mcfluff"
